author: djames
msg: Generate vtable invokers in autogen.sh. Generate SWIG C files in autogen.sh
when release mode is enabled. Update required version of SWIG to 1.3.24 and
(SWIG_INCLUDES): Remove SWIG-specific defines and SWIG runtime library
Contains options for Python, Perl, and Ruby.
SWIG_LDFLAGS, SWIG_LIBSWIG_DIR): Remove variables and associated
checks. These are no longer necessary because SWIG is configured in
(_is_executable): New method. Checks whether a given path is an executable
(_find_executable): New method. Search for a specified file in a given
list of directories. If no directories are given, search according to
(_get_swig_version): New method. Get the version number of SWIG.
(_get_apr_include_path): New method. Get the APR include directory.
(_write_callbacks): New method. Write invoker functions for callbacks.
(_write_swig_interface_file): Update method to also output callbacks
in the interface file. We also remove any comments that are present in
the interface file so that they do not cause issues.
(_build_opts): New method. Lists options to pass in to SWIG for a given
(_checkout): New method. Checkout SWIG header from SWIG.
(_write_external_runtime): New method. Generate external runtime header files
(_get_swig_includes): New method. Get list of SWIG includes as a string
(_get_swig_deps): New method. Get list of SWIG dependencies.
(_write_swig_deps): New method. Write SWIG dependencies to swig-outputs.mk.
(write): Update method to output external runtime headers and SWIG
(TargetSWIG.add_dependencies): Output Perl SWIG C files to
(ra_reporter.hi, delta_editor.hi): Remove includes. These vtable invokers
are now generated by autogen.sh and included automatically.
Instead of hardcoding includes from SWIG library, include
Remove file. We don't need compatibility with old versions of SWIG
Remove code for generating SWIG headers. These headers are now
Remove file. These vtable invokers are now generated by autogen.sh.
Update requirements to reflect that SWIG 1.3.24 is now required.
Add SWIG outputs to the end of build-outputs.mk. Compile SWIG headers
into standalone C files if we are in release mode.
